title: Habit Tracking Mobile App
description: Cross-platform mobile application for habit formation and tracking, featuring data analytics and behavioral insights. Demonstrates product management skills through user-centered design and iterative development approach.
outcomes: Architected scalable database schema for habit tracking and analytics
Implemented user authentication and data synchronization
Designed intuitive UX flow based on behavioral psychology principles

title: Desktop Productivity Suite
description: Comprehensive desktop application for project management and productivity tracking. Showcases technical program management through complex system architecture and cross-platform deployment strategies.
outcomes: Designed modular architecture supporting plugin ecosystem
Integrated third-party APIs for enhanced functionality
Established automated testing and CI/CD pipeline
